title: FS T206 Seymours.. many different backs  **ALL CARDS NOW SOLD**
author: Blunder19

posts.post_title: FS T206 Seymours.. many different backs  **ALL CARDS NOW SOLD**
posts.post_content:
All cards sold.. everyone loves Seymour! :) 

Hello Everyone..

I have decided to part with some of my T206 Seymours.. several of these are very hard to find front/back combinations, seldom seen for sale.  

Please see the below list along with pricing and pictures.. best way to communicate with me is by email at [url]blunder19@aol.com[/url]    

All prices include shipping...

  * American Beauty 350 No Frame SGC 40....            $300.. SOLD
  * American Beauty 350 No Frame SGC 10....            $120.. SOLD
  * Pied 460 Fact 42 SGC 10...                                   $200.. SOLD                    
  * EPDG SGC 40....                                                  $175                       
  * EPDG SGC 10 (presents very well for the grade).... $100.. SOLD
  * SC 350 Fact 30  SGC 2.5...                                    $50.. SOLD                         
  * SC 460 Fact 42 No Overprint SGC 30....                  $40.. SOLD
  * Cycle 460 SGC 30.....                                            $250..SOLD
  * Sov 350 SGC 30....                                               $75.. SOLD
  * Old Mill SGC 20 (presents very well for the grade)... $75.. SOLD
  * Tolstoi SGC 20....                                                   $75.. SOLD
